con:config.con:query: update FRAUD_KRITERIER set OPPRORADATO = '${=CommonLibrary.getDate("dd-MMM-yy")}', AJORADATO = '${=CommonLibrary.getDate("dd-MMM-yy")}' where INSTITUTION_CODE = '4201'

select VU.USERID as CUSTOMERID,VU.ACCOUNTNUMBER,VU.BANKORGID,VU.CURRENCYCODE from v_authorisation VA, V_AUTH_USERINFO VU where VA.ACCOUNTNUMBER = VU.ACCOUNTNUMBER and BANKORGID = '4201' and length(userid)='11' and markettype = 'PM' and CHANNEL = 'INT' and ROLETYPE ='EIER' and ACCOUNTROLENAME = 'Register' and ROWNUM=1
select VU.ACCOUNTNUMBER,VU.CURRENCYCODE from v_authorisation VA, V_AUTH_USERINFO VU where VA.ACCOUNTNUMBER = VU.ACCOUNTNUMBER and VA.CUSTOMERID = '${#TestSuite#fraudCustomer}' and ROWNUM=1
